title: Fix Registration Redirect Timeout
description: Root cause found: Registration API was calling hashPassword() for validation, which hashes with bcrypt (12 rounds, ~250-500ms). This happened before Payload CMS also hashed the password, resulting in ~500ms-1s wasted on double hashing. Fixed by making validatePasswordStrength() public and calling it directly instead.
